post.author: MNeMiC
post.body:
This video will show you how easy it is to setup a trite (spider-like monster), to slide down from a string from the ceiling. It's just to setup a premade animation for it.

http://www.mnemic.tk/education/videotut ... o_tscc.rar

Length:1:34 Minutes

post.body:

post.author: pbmax
post.body: all of his video links are like that. but as you found out, they are still available to download, you just have to go to his site and find them.
